title: Polymer Structure& Props
description: Formulations and analysis of molecular and phenomenological models of elastic and viscoelastic behavior, development and description of structure, and fundamental aspects of structure-property relations.  Crosslisted with CHE, MSE, and PTFE 6768.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 4776 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 4776 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 4776 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 4776 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PTFE 4776 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
